alert.note: Alert for Western Mineral (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 24 at 12:59PM EST until December 25 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...Western Mineral County. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until 6 PM EST this evening. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to noon EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
